backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, lobby management, player state, and game/match tracking with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose in the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and light/dark theme color variables with OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling theme, navigation state, and view routing.
frontend/src/game/components/ImpactEffec: Renders short‑lived bullet impact lights and spheres, exposing an addImpact method via ref.
frontend/src/game/components/PlayerArmsA: First‑person weapon model with recoil, muzzle flash, and firing logic tied to useWeapon.
frontend/src/game/components/RemotePlaye: Displays remote player avatars with interpolated movement, rotation, and a floating name label.
frontend/src/game/controls/useFpsControl: Implements FPS camera controls with keyboard, mouse‑look, movement, gravity, jumping, crouching, and pointer lock handling.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: Wrapper for a React Three Fiber Canvas with configured camera, fog, and rendering settings.
frontend/src/game/scenes/OfflineSkirmish: Renders an offline target‑practice scene with moving targets, FPS movement, weapon firing with spread, and hit detection via raycasting.
frontend/src/game/scenes/OnlineMatchScen: Renders an online match scene using FPS controls, syncing player position to the server and displaying remote player avatars.
frontend/src/game/scenes/TrainingScene.t: Provides a static training map with FPS controls, target dummies, and simple impact effects when firing.
frontend/src/game/weapons/offlineWeapons: Defines basic weapon configs for offline mode including fire rate, spread, and damage.
frontend/src/game/weapons/useWeapon.ts: Hook managing weapon firing logic, enforcing fire rate and computing shot direction from the camera.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login management using AuthClient, exposing identity state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, lobbies, players, and game actions via the backend actor with caching and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for themes plus utility styles like gradients and HUD panel.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomeView.tsx: Renders the main menu with background, login, and navigation buttons for training, offline, and online modes.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyView.tsx: Displays active lobbies, allows creating/joining/leaving lobbies, starting games, and handles authentication and profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineSkirmishView.t: Runs the offline skirmish scene with stats tracking, weapon switching, and an ESC pause menu.
frontend/src/pages/OnlineGameView.tsx: Hosts the online match scene with HUD and an ESC pause menu for returning to the lobby.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingView.tsx: Runs the training scene with HUD and an ESC-accessible pause menu with controls info.
frontend/src/ui/DisclaimerFooter.tsx: Renders a footer with a legal disclaimer and a referral link using the current hostname as a tracking parameter.
frontend/src/ui/HudOverlay.tsx: Displays an in-game HUD showing crosshair, stats, and mode-specific info such as online sync, offline stats, or training labels.
frontend/src/ui/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button using Internet Identity with loading and error‑handling logic.
frontend/src/ui/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to create a profile and saves the chosen username.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessages.ts: Converts various error types into user‑friendly messages while preserving detailed errors for logging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations for the app's UI theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, issues, and the current state of the game's development.
